column4: My graphic card is Radeon HD 4200. In thes page: http://support.amd.com/us/gpudownload/Pages/index.aspx what item should i select? Desktop graphics, embedded graphics or Integrated motherboard graphics?
Thanks. which item did you select?
hd radeon 4xxx... but its same for all radeon
check that out and folow it

I want to understand what type my graphic card is?
the driver is a bundle of alot of drivers.
do you have a laptop or a desktop?
